overview: After Ned Hamilton is rejected by his girlfriend, he travels to Japan where he hears an old legend about the Willow Tree Princess, who kills herself so that her lover will go off to battle. When he makes a purchase from Tomotada, an image maker, he meets his pretty daughter O-Riu, and they recreate the events of the legend.
tagline: The Romantic Fantasy of Old Japan Starring Dainty and Adorable VIOLA DANA
title: The Willow Tree
